column4: Dec. 10 (Xinhua) — A direct flight will be launched Tuesday between north China’s Tianjin Municipality and Sihanoukville
column5: a coastal city in Cambodia.------The air route will be operated by Cambodia’s JC International Airlines
column6: according to Tianjin Binhai International Airport.------Two round trips are scheduled every week. On Tuesdays and Saturdays
column7: the flight is scheduled to depart from Sihanoukville
column9: at 6:15 p.m. and arrive in Tianjin at 0:15 a.m. the next day
column10: local time. The return flight departs from Tianjin at 1:15 a.m. on Wednesdays and Sundays and arrives in Sihanoukville at 5:30 a.m.------China is the largest source of foreign visitors to Cambodia. In the first nine months
column13: according to a report released by Cambodian Tourism Ministry in November.------http://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2018-12/10/c_137663334.htm
